pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dbt log parser[![Version](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/mdzhang/dbt_log_parser)](https://github.com/mdzhang/dbt_log_parser)[![Pypi](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/dbt_log_parser.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/dbt_log_parser)[![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/mdzhang/dbt_log_parser.svg)](LICENSE)[![Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/mdzhang/dbt_log_parser/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/mdzhang/dbt_log_parser)[![Style](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/ambv/black)[![Docs](https://readthedocs.org/projects/dbt-log-parser/badge/?)](https://dbt-log-parser.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)Python package and CLI tool for parsing structured (JSON) data from a [dbt](https://github.com/fishtown-analytics/dbt) log.# Change Log## v0.2.1### üêõ Bug Fixes- [bugfix]: import fails on <3.7 b/c of dataclasses dep; closes #18 (#19) @mdzhang## v0.2.0### üöÄ New Features and Enhancements- [feature]: parse string argument; closes #13 (#14) @mdzhang### üî® Maintenance- [ci]: Add code coverage to CI checks; closes #10 (#11) @mdzhang- [docs]: Add Sphinx docs; closes #8 (#9) @mdzhang- [ci]: Add release pipeline using GitHub Actions; closes #6 (#7) @mdzhang- [ci]: Add CI test pipeline; closes #2 (#3) @mdzhang## v0.1.0* Initial non-alpha release, now that project has improved tests anddocumentation## v0.1.0a0* Initial release
